snippet: Christopher Harper-Mercer, identified as the gunman who killed nine people in Oregon, left behind 13 guns and a list of online grievances.
abstract: Profile of Christopher Harper-Mercer, Roseburg, Ore, gunman who killed nine students during Umpqua Community College rampage; left little behind except hoard of guns and online statements of anger and frustration.

byline.original: By JACK HEALY and IAN LOVETT
byline.contributor: Jack Healy reported from Roseburg, and Ian Lovett from Torrance, Calif. Liam Stack and Michael S. Schmidt contributed reporting from New York, and Dirk VanderHart from Roseburg.

lead_paragraph: Christopher Harper-Mercer, identified as the gunman who killed nine people in Oregon, left behind 13 guns and a list of online grievances.

headline.main: Oregon Killer Described as Man of Few Words, Except on Topic of Guns
headline.print_headline: Oregon Killer Described as Man of Few Words, Except on Topic of Guns
